name: JJ (JJ & Friends!)
description:
Controls: Keyboard and mouse

Audio: There is music that plays automatically

Ages: Everyone

Tip: If you think you've reached a dead end to the story, you can restart by pressing [Esc]. But be aware -- not everything that seems like a dead end actually is!

Tip: Just like real life, this game won't let you pause or save. But during most of the game nothing is on a timer, so you can take a break and come back later.
